about_the_game:
You and your friends open and manage a video game store in a mall during the mid 90s. Sell games, expand your store, host midnight sales and VIP visits and grow your store to become the geeky superstore of your dreams!

Never Stop Gaming is a love letter to the video game stores we grew up in, and the wild characters that made these stores so special. At its core, Never Stop Gaming is a cozy 4 player co-op business simulation: Order games and consoles, place them on shelves and sell them to customers. As your store becomes more successful, expand it to include additional sections for merchandise, tabletop games, card games and a LAN Party section.

While operating the store, you will perform hilarious missions, host VIP visits and get involved in the life of customers who love video games more than you. Just kidding, we know that’s not possible.

This game is in early development. More information coming soon :)

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Win 10 64 Bit
  • Processor: Intel i5-4690 / Intel i3-10100 / AMD Ryzen 3 1200
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 1050 / AMD RX 460 / Intel Arc A380
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 10 GB available space
